answers.answer: I hope everything goes well!! Goodluck! :)
Me too. I don't want to be induced because my platelet level is too low for an epidural. So inducing without an epidural does not sound fun... So in hoping I get some type of good news.

question: So tomorrow ( well today Monday) I will find out if I will be getting induced or not and when if I am. I'm considered borderline preeclampsia so I'm just wondering how this will play out. I'm currently 37+5
title: doctor appointment
